Dragons of Tarkir Mobile Spoiler DoT Mobile DoT
Ojutai Monument
3
Artifact
U

T: Add W or U to your mana pool.

4WU: Ojutai Monument becomes a 4/4 green and white Dragon creature with flying until end of turn.

Ojutai spends time at all his strongholds, but he most favors Cori Stronghold for his meditation.
